      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_487b75bd343f56ac5b72777a12d9a752c45828ca</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Temperature vs. volume plot of a fixed mass of gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Temperatur gegen Datenträgerplot einer örtlich 
festgelegten Masse des Gases</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La température contre le traçage de volume 
d'une masse fixe du gaz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Temperatura contra o lote do volume de uma massa 
fixa do gás</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Temperatura contro il diagramma del volume di una
massa fissa di gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θερμοκρασία εναντίον της πλοκής έντασης του ήχου μιας
σταθερής μάζας αέριο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Temperatura contra diagrama del volumen de una 
masa fija del gas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The axes may be used to plot the dependence of the volume of a fixed mass of gas to changes in the temperature.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">volume</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Äxte können benutzt werden, um die 
Abhängigkeit des Datenträgers einer örtlich festgelegten Masse des 
Gases zu den Änderungen in der Temperatur zu plotten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les haches peuvent être utilisées pour tracer 
la dépendance du volume d'une masse fixe du gaz aux changements de la
température.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os machados podem ser usados traçar a 
dependência do volume de uma massa fixa do gás às mudanças na 
temperatura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le ascie possono essere utilizzate per tracciare 
la dipendenza del volume di una massa fissa di gas ai cambiamenti 
nella temperatura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι άξονες μπορούν να χρησιμοποιηθούν για να σχεδιάσουν
την εξάρτηση της έντασης του ήχου μιας σταθερής μάζας αέριο 
στις αλλαγές στη θερμοκρασία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las hachas se pueden utilizar para trazar la 
dependencia del volumen de una masa fija del gas a los cambios en la 
temperatura.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Temperatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Datenträger</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">gaz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la température</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">volume</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gás</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">temperatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">volume</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">temperatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">volume</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αέριο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-es">gas</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">temperatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">volumen</string>
